experience.description: Managed payment infrastructure for many domestic and international merchants, ensuring high reliability and uptime. Designed, implemented, and optimized RESTful APIs for payments, refunds, and checkout SDKs. Diagnosed and resolved production issues efficiently using Kibana and OpenSearch. Collaborated with product and engineering teams to develop real-time payment solutions and improve transaction performance.
